author: Dana Milbank
title: The problem isn’t a lack of information. It’s Trump. - The Washington Post
description:
1. The problem isn’t a lack of information. It’s Trump.  The Washington Post
  2. Washington Post: US officials at WHO relayed real-time coronavirus information to Trump administration  CNN
  3. WHO officials were sharing information with CDC s…
content: U.S. personnel working in the U.S. Embassy in Beijing met extensively with WHO officials there in the month of January, the time when Trump accuses the WHO of conspiring with China to hide the true danger of the novel coronavirus. According to people familiar… [+4859 chars]
